targets.query: SELECT sum("flows_as_client") FROM "host:active_flows" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("flows_as_server") FROM "host:active_flows" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("flows_as_server")+sum("flows_as_client") FROM "host:active_flows" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)

panels.title: Media Flussi Attivi per intervallo di tempo

targets.query: Select  non_negative_difference( sum("flows_as_server")) + non_negative_difference(sum( "flows_as_client"))  from "host:misbehaving_flows" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_difference( sum("flows_as_client")) FROM "host:misbehaving_flows" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_difference( sum("flows_as_server")) FROM "host:misbehaving_flows" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)

panels.title: Nuovi Flussi misbehaving in intervallo di tempo

panels.description: Raccoglie li numero di flussi misbehaving  in ordine di tempo per ogni host

targets.query: SELECT "host","flows_as_client" AS "n. flussi client", "flows_as_server" AS "n.flussi server" FROM "host:misbehaving_flows" WHERE   "flows_as_client">0 OR "flows_as_server">0 AND $timeFilter  order by time desc

panels.title: Misbehaving  host timeline

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference( sum("flows_as_client")) FROM "host:total_flows" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_difference( sum("flows_as_server")) FROM "host:total_flows" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)

Select sum(client)+sum(server)from(SELECT non_negative_difference( sum("flows_as_client"))as "client",non_negative_difference( sum("flows_as_server")) as "server" FROM "host:total_flows" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null))

panels.description: Calcola i nuovi flussi anomali dell'host selezionato ( men첫 tendina in alto a destra )

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(sum("flows_as_client"))FROM "host:misbehaving_flows" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: New misbehaving_flows ( host )

panels.description: Statistiche sui pacchetti IN/OUT ( Lost, Out of Order, Retransmission ) selezionare l'host interessato dal men첫 tendina(in alto a sinistra)

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(sum("packets_sent")) FROM "host:tcp_packets" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s),host fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_difference(sum("packets_rcvd")) FROM "host:tcp_packets" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s),host fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("lost_packets"), 10s) FROM "host:tcp_tx_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s),host fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("out_of_order_packets"), 1s) FROM "host:tcp_tx_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s),host fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("retransmission_packets"), 1s) FROM "host:tcp_tx_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) ,host fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("out_of_order_packets"), 1s) FROM "host:tcp_rx_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s),host fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("lost_packets"), 1s) FROM "host:tcp_rx_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s),host fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("retransmission_packets"), 1s) FROM "host:tcp_rx_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s),host fill(null)

panels.title: Numero Pacchetti TCP(host)

panels.description: Calcola il troughput diviso per Categorie dell'host selezionato ( men첫 tendina in alto a destra )

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("bytes_rcvd"), 1s) *8 AS "IN", non_negative_derivative(sum("bytes_sent"), 1s) *8 AS "OUT" FROM "host:ndpi_categories" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s), "host", "category" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("bytes_rcvd"), 1s)*8 AS "IN", non_negative_derivative(sum("bytes_sent"), 1s)*8  AS "OUT" FROM "host:ndpi_categories" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s), "host", "category" fill(null)

panels.title: Troughput ( host ) for all ndpi categories

panels.description: Troughput diviso per protocollo sull'intera interfaccia

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("bytes"), 1s) * 8 FROM "iface:ndpi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s), "protocol" fill(null)

panels.title: Troughput interfaccia per protocollo

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("bytes_rcvd"), 1s)*8 AS "IN", non_negative_derivative(sum("bytes_sent"), 1s)*8  AS "OUT" FROM "host:l4protos" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s), "host", "l4proto" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative( sum("bytes"),1s) *8  FROM "iface:l4protos"  WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY "l4proto", time(1s) fill(null)

list.label: host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = host
